name: eRetailing
overview:
eRetailing operates several websites specializing in customizable products. On these websites, users can design and purchase t-shirts, underwear, hoodies, bags, and more.

eRetailing is known for their robust and easy-to-use design center. Users can add text, add art, and upload their own images to create their own personalized items. They can also change fonts, colors, sizes, and much more.

eRetailing’s three sites:

1) Customized Girl

Customized Girl is a niche custom apparel site aimed at women of all ages. In the design center, users can start typing and watch as the text appears on their item. Customized Girl is known for it’s huge selection of trendy styles, from underwear to tank tops to hoodies to pillow cases.

2) Bridal Party Tees

Bridal Party Tees gives brides and bachelorette parties the ability to quickly and easily design their own shirts and other apparel. Users can start from scratch or customize a ready-made design.

3) FunnyShirts.org

At FunnyShirts.org, customers can browse an enormous gallery of humorous designs, each one of which is completely customizable. Most designs are featured on Men’s t-shirts, but using the design center, customers can easily change the item to Women’s shirts, Kid’s shirts, hoodies and more. They can also, of course, add their own text, art, and images.

eRetailing now markets its unique design center as software to partners interested in a fully integrated personalization solution.
